data.lyric:
[ti:Diamond Teeth Samurai]
[ar:Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:Diamond Teeth Samurai]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Diamond Teeth Samurai (Explicit) - Youngboy Never Broke Again
[00:02.70]Aye
[00:02.87]
[00:03.43]Aye they might could do it better
[00:04.61]I ain't trippin' off all that sh*t
[00:05.79]
[00:11.23]Used to be broke but now I'm rich I'm spendin' every penny
[00:13.87]2Pac Shakur ridin' through the North up in the Bentley
[00:16.65]Curtis Jackson ain't no actin' when I'm on a mission
[00:19.15]Tryna assassinate my character I ain't say I did it
[00:21.85]n***a you got that yayo well cook somethin' n***a
[00:24.10]n***a you let them Ks go well bust somethin' n***a
[00:26.82]Oh you duckin' them laws you better run from them n***a
[00:29.34]Oh you playin' with that raw well look here front some n***a
[00:32.21]The block is hot the block is hot
[00:34.18]
[00:35.12]The block is hot the block is hot
[00:36.85]
[00:37.80]The block is hot the block is hot
[00:39.53]
[00:40.44]The block is hot the block is hot
[00:42.20]
[00:43.42]Whole lotta killing Helter Skelter like I'm Charles Manson
[00:46.22]These niggas hatin' now keep that hammer all these diamonds dancin'
[00:48.93]Me and Meek Mill watchin' movies in Rick Ross mansion
[00:51.54]You disrespect I up the TEC and let you niggas have it
[00:54.24]23 shots Lebron James I shoot the cavalier
[00:56.45]
[00:57.07]These niggas speakin' on my name I'ma get it clear
[00:59.60]When they shot they aimed for my brain but I'm still here
[01:02.32]I'm a Bad Boy never met Diddy but that's what it is
[01:05.06]Used to be broke but now I'm rich I'm spendin' every penny
[01:07.48]2Pac Shakur ridin' through the North up in the Bentley
[01:10.51]Curtis Jackson ain't no actin' when I'm on a mission
[01:13.12]Tryna assassinate my character I ain't say I did it
[01:15.68]n***a you got that yayo well cook somethin' n***a
[01:18.05]n***a you let them Ks go well bust somethin' n***a
[01:20.68]Oh you duckin' them laws you better run from them n***a
[01:23.34]Oh you playin' with that raw well look here front some n***a
[01:26.07]The block is hot the block is hot
[01:28.12]
[01:29.08]The block is hot the block is hot
[01:30.78]
[01:31.71]The block is hot the block is hot
[01:33.40]
[01:34.25]The block is hot the block is hot
[01:36.17]
[01:36.85]I'm in the all-white Porsche wit' heat ridin' through Hollygrove
[01:39.41]Discussin' 'bout what it's gon' take to get them birds gone
[01:42.16]Say look lil' daddy I ain't your whoadie make me bust your dome
[01:44.68]Got a 100 shots up in the Caddy while I'm headed home
[01:47.77]My lil' hitter quiet like Slim we gon' shoot above the rim
[01:50.52]We gon' pop 'em when we see 'em
[01:51.96]Whip his pockets 'fore we kill 'em
[01:53.21]We got the police on our trail so we runnin' when we see 'em
[01:55.93]Don't wanna front us no h****n we gon' rob 'em when we see 'em b**ch
[01:58.91]Police hit our stash house but we ain't closing shop
[02:01.43]They got some niggas movin' work to stay right up the block
[02:04.16]Knock on the door I need a zone yeah I got the guap
[02:06.88]Soon as he open up the door he gon' see the Glock
[02:09.43]n***a you got that yayo well cook somethin' n***a
[02:11.89]n***a you let them Ks go well bust somethin' n***a
[02:14.63]Oh you duckin' them laws you better run from them n***a
[02:17.23]Oh you playin' with that raw well look here front some n***a
[02:19.99]The block is hot the block is hot
[02:22.04]
[02:22.99]The block is hot the block is hot
[02:24.65]
[02:25.61]The block is hot the block is hot
[02:27.36]
[02:28.18]The block is hot the block is hot
data.trans:
[ti:Diamond Teeth Samurai]
[ar:Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:Diamond Teeth Samurai]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:02.70]//
[00:02.87]
[00:03.43]他们也许会做得更好
[00:04.61]我并不是在嘲笑这一切
[00:05.79]
[00:11.23]我曾破产 但现在 我赚得盆满钵满 我花钱如流水 
[00:13.87]和2Pac Shakur一起 开着宾利车朝北行驶
[00:16.65]当我在执行任务时 我发现Curtis Jackson是个十分真实的人
[00:19.15]执法人员试图说服我 但我拒不认罪
[00:21.85]伙计 你有**吗 你会将它们提纯吗 伙计
[00:24.10]伙计 握紧你的AK-47 可千万别走火 伙计
[00:26.82]你无视律法 你最好能逃脱他们的追捕 伙计
[00:29.34]你真是擅长这个游戏 看前面 伙计
[00:32.21]让我向Lil Wayne的首张专辑《The Block Is Hot》致敬
[00:34.18]
[00:35.12]让我向Lil Wayne的首张专辑《The Block Is Hot》致敬
[00:36.85]
[00:37.80]让我向Lil Wayne的首张专辑《The Block Is Hot》致敬
[00:39.53]
[00:40.44]让我向Lil Wayne的首张专辑《The Block Is Hot》致敬
[00:42.20]
[00:43.42]我想要像Charles Manson那样 杀死美国连环杀手Helter Skelter
[00:46.22]那些人拿着枪支 却妄图像上世纪的艺术家MC Hammer那样 以华丽的舞蹈闻名于世
[00:48.93]我和Meek Mill一起 在Rick Ross大厦看电影
[00:51.54]你如此失礼 我会给你们点厉害瞧瞧
[00:54.24]我会像穿着23号球衣的Lebron James那样 所向披靡
[00:56.45]
[00:57.07]人们谈论着我的战绩 我闻名于世
[00:59.60]不少人试图**我 他们朝着我的头部射击 但我依然活着
[01:02.32]我是个坏男孩 但我从未见过肖恩康姆斯 这是事实
[01:05.06]我曾破产 但现在我赚得盆满钵满 我花钱如流水 
[01:07.48]和2Pac Shakur一起 开着宾利车朝北行驶
[01:10.51]当我在执行任务时 我发现Curtis Jackson是个十分真实的人
[01:13.12]执法人员试图说服我 但我拒不认罪
[01:15.68]伙计 你有**吗 你会将它们提纯吗 伙计
[01:18.05]伙计 握紧你的AK-47 可千万别走火 伙计
[01:20.68]你无视律法 你最好能逃脱他们的追捕 伙计
[01:23.34]你真是擅长这个游戏 快看前方 伙计
[01:26.07]让我向Lil Wayne的首张专辑《The Block Is Hot》致敬
[01:28.12]
[01:29.08]让我向Lil Wayne的首张专辑《The Block Is Hot》致敬
[01:30.78]
[01:31.71]让我向Lil Wayne的首张专辑《The Block Is Hot》致敬
[01:33.40]
[01:34.25]让我向Lil Wayne的首张专辑《The Block Is Hot》致敬
[01:36.17]
[01:36.85]我开着纯白色的保时捷 穿越Hollygrove
[01:39.41]我们一路上肆意谈论着 该如何给他们好看
[01:42.16]我说 看 肖恩康姆斯 我可不会像你那样 我会随心所欲 为所欲为
[01:44.68]开着凯迪拉克 我驱车回家 一路上出尽风头 被媒体拍了无数张照片
[01:47.77]Slim是基金会的创始人 他总是沉默不语 我们可不会这么低调
[01:50.52]当我们看到他们时 我们要震慑他们
[01:51.96]在我们杀他们之前 先翻翻他们的口袋
[01:53.21]警察已因我们而出动 因此在他们看到我们之前 我们要快点逃离这里
[01:55.93]别想追上我们 我们可没带** 我们不过是看到那些**时 顺手**了一下
[01:58.91]警察突袭了我们的藏匿处 我们忘了关门
[02:01.43]他们给一些人换了个住处 而另一些人依然待在街区
[02:04.16]敲了敲门 我需要一个藏身之处 是的 我遇到麻烦了
[02:06.88]他一打开门 就会看到我拿枪抵着他的脑袋
[02:09.43]伙计 你有**吗 你会将它们提纯吗 伙计
[02:11.89]伙计 握紧你的AK-47 可千万别走火 伙计
[02:14.63]你无视律法 你最好能逃脱他们的追捕 伙计
[02:17.23]你真是擅长这个游戏 看前面 伙计
[02:19.99]让我向Lil Wayne的首张专辑《The Block Is Hot》致敬
[02:22.04]
[02:22.99]让我向Lil Wayne的首张专辑《The Block Is Hot》致敬
[02:24.65]
[02:25.61]让我向Lil Wayne的首张专辑《The Block Is Hot》致敬
